name: Infinite Toiletpaper
description:
How to play:

Arrow keys to move

you leave a trail of toilet paper behind you that you can't cross. 

Space pulls all of your trail back

If an enemy was standing on your trail, they trip and die.

C to quit.

Credits:

I made all graphics except logo.png which was made by Tyler Tomaseski for the game jam and was the cartridge I based my game on. 

iTecAI helped me with a little code.

Music: Hello My Friend from https://www.royaltyfree-music.com/

Font: Minecraft by Craftron Gaming
